title: saganman
author: saganman
created_time: July 26, 2023, 10:13:18 PMLast edit: July 27, 2023, 05:05:15 AM by saganman
content: https://ruinedcanvas.comHi I made this.I personally really enjoy these collaborative pixel art apps and so wanted to make a dapp for it.Being on eth helps mitigate bots.Joining costs a small extra fee, but placing pixels is free + gas.The cooldown is currently only 1 block.There are no censorship functions or server connections, everything here is opensource and on client.Happy painting
